query:
UPDATE user_learning_statistics SET
                total_items = $3,
                mastered_items = $4,
                learning_items = $5,
                new_items = $6,
                total_sessions = $7,
                total_reviews = $8,
                overall_accuracy = $9,
                average_session_duration_seconds = $10,
                daily_review_average = $11,
                current_streak_days = $12,
                longest_streak_days = $13,
                last_calculated_at = NOW(),
                updated_at = NOW()
            WHERE user_id = $1 AND id = $2
